post.author: Admin
post.title: Reminders from Mr. Vitale
post.description: Dear Band Families: As you are doing your “Back-To-School” Shopping, talk to your student and verify
post.content:
Dear Band Families:

As you are doing your “Back-To-School” Shopping, talk to your student and verify they have EVERYTHING they need for this marching band season!

  • Combination lock
  • Instrument Lyre (at Royalton Music Center)
  • Flip-folder pages (at Royalton Music Center)
  • Band T-Shirt (purchased through band website)
  • Band Polo (purchased through band website)
  • Marching Band Shoes (any resizes or late orders - go directly to Royalton Music)
  • Black Calf-Length Socks - NOT ANKLE SOCKS - at least one, perhaps 2 pairs
  • Black Gloves (purchased at Royalton Music Center) - at least one, perhaps 2 pairs
  • Khaki Pants - (not cargo pants - not corduroy pants)
  • Black Belt
  • UnderArmor (black) / Long Johns - (for the colder weather) - reminder pajama pants / flannel pants / fleece pants are NOT permitted under the uniform, and they are too bulky, so investing in a pair of long johns or UnderArmor (black) for the colder weather would be wise.

Thanks,

Mr. Vitale
